data.actual_result: Then nickname pushes the timestamp off the screen, and even wraps the username to a new line if it is long enough
data.expected_result: The nickname is cut off early and the timestamp is fully shown
data.short_description: Having a long username/nickname pushes the timestamp off the screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your nickname to something long, such as WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW - send a message
